description: Analyzing President Trump’s handshakes with world leaders has become something of a sport, so we had two professionals do it.
title: All the President’s Handshakes
title_page: All the President’s Handshakes - The New York Times
maintext:
WASHINGTON — Among social media spectators, anticipating what sort of handshake President Trump will deploy in his public interactions has become something of a sport.
Will Mr. Trump remain locked in a friendly death grip with another world leader, as he did on Friday with President Emmanuel Macron of France?
Will he try the old pull-and-pat maneuver, knocking his salutatory prey off balance, as he did with Neil M. Gorsuch, then a Supreme Court nominee?
Or will he completely miss (or ignore) the cue to shake hands, as he did with Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany?
